dotnetType.name: TimestampSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" />
            or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" /> and attempts to map them to
            <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> or <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new timestamp serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a timestamp serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimestampSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
